root.name: Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade: The Graphic Adventure
root.description: OverviewIndiana Jones and The Last Crusade is a point and click adventure game based on the movie of the same name. While it follows the plot of the film in broad terms, it also adds to existing sequences for the film, or creates new ones altogether, presumably to flesh out the experience. Unlike later LucasArts titles, it is possible for the protagonist to die.The game also features music from John Williams' score to the film. If you didn't have a soundcard this would be limited to short bursts of PC speaker jingles. It was re-released via Steam on July 8th, 2009.FeaturesGame manual in the form of Dr. Jones Sr.'s Grail diaryDifferent styles of gameplay: puzzles, boxing, and flyingIndy Quotient (IQ) scorning system, rewarding different solutions to puzzles, and adding replay value
